channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen Which is part of why they released the photo. A five year old can search a box of documents for properly labeled classified documents — which is not something I knew 24 hours ago.
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen Which is part of why they released the photo. A five year old can search a box of documents for properly labeled classified documents — which is not something I knew 24 hours ago.

item.description: @AkivaMCohen I can’t help but think, “no you can’t rifle through the boxes a bit” wasn’t a major clue.
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen I can’t help but think, “no you can’t rifle through the boxes a bit” wasn’t a major clue.

item.description:
@Adderabbi @DBashIdeas Is that an actual paper title?

@Adderabbi @DBashIdeas Because if it’s only a potential paper, I’m going to suggest “Better Call Soloveitchik: Authority and Discipleship in the 20th Century American Orthodox Rabbinate.”
item.source:markdown:
@Adderabbi @DBashIdeas Is that an actual paper title?
@Adderabbi @DBashIdeas Because if it’s only a potential paper, I’m going to suggest “Better Call Soloveitchik: Authority and Discipleship in the 20th Century American Orthodox Rabbinate.”

item.description: @dzkalman Well? Was there?
item.source:markdown: @dzkalman Well? Was there?

item.description: @Rodrigo02380168 @ZachWeiner “In our system” — do you mean the solar system? Or one of the many earthling nations? Which points the way to one of the first legal problems Zach will have to address in his book.
item.source:markdown: @Rodrigo02380168 @ZachWeiner “In our system” — do you mean the solar system? Or one of the many earthling nations? Which points the way to one of the first legal problems Zach will have to address in his book.

item.description: @tombstoneblues @fmc_dylan Also, weren’t there 10 Bromberg recordings, of which four were leaked? These two are among the leaked, which seems fishy.
item.source:markdown: @tombstoneblues @fmc_dylan Also, weren’t there 10 Bromberg recordings, of which four were leaked? These two are among the leaked, which seems fishy.

item.description: @fmc_dylan Hoping we get a 45 minute take of Highlands.
item.source:markdown: @fmc_dylan Hoping we get a 45 minute take of Highlands.

item.description: While it’s always fun (and appropriate) to bash the Times, it’s also worth noting that Bret Stephens, despite his myriad flaws, has positioned himself as a Jewish communal “thought” leader. https://t.co/hpaSNtk7Br
item.source:markdown: While it’s always fun (and appropriate) to bash the Times, it’s also worth noting that Bret Stephens, despite his myriad flaws, has positioned himself as a Jewish communal “thought” leader. https://t.co/hpaSNtk7Br

item.description:
Your occasional reminder that back in 2005, Commentary magazine decided that supporting the war in Iraq required defending the Crusades. https://t.co/GgfBCYJgF9

This apropos of this fascinating thread about new research in Ashkenazi genetics made possible by a Crusader massacre in England in 1190. https://t.co/ef5rUglVX4
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @YehudisFletcher @UnitedSynagogue @BoardofDeputies The @TimesofIsrael story on this paper said they got one back in 2014.

item.description: @Shmarya Should, shmoud. Tachls: Can we monetize his tzuris somehow? Maybe set up some pay-to-pray tehillim WhatsApp groups on his behalf?
item.source:markdown: @Shmarya Should, shmoud. Tachls: Can we monetize his tzuris somehow? Maybe set up some pay-to-pray tehillim WhatsApp groups on his behalf?

item.description: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai Really, a crazy good batch of stories, obscured first by his Ender success and then his wingnut politics. “Fat Farm” meets Larry Niven’s criterion of being able to tell over at a cocktail party — or in a tweet.
item.source:markdown: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai Really, a crazy good batch of stories, obscured first by his Ender success and then his wingnut politics. “Fat Farm” meets Larry Niven’s criterion of being able to tell over at a cocktail party — or in a tweet.

item.description: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai What was striking in his first stories, compared to those that surrounded them in the issues of Analog and the like where they appeared, was the physicality. The sense of bodies, sometimes tortured, generally absent in the stories of engineers.
item.source:markdown: @CTMcIntire418 @EladNehorai What was striking in his first stories, compared to those that surrounded them in the issues of Analog and the like where they appeared, was the physicality. The sense of bodies, sometimes tortured, generally absent in the stories of engineers.

item.description: @VThePR @BeschlossDC No, because that was filed tonight. Perhaps he spoke with someone who told him what he could expect in the filing. Which, except for the photo, was largely predictable.
item.source:markdown: @VThePR @BeschlossDC No, because that was filed tonight. Perhaps he spoke with someone who told him what he could expect in the filing. Which, except for the photo, was largely predictable.

item.description: @trekonomics Families, man. The Book of Genesis tried to warn us, but did we listen?
item.source:markdown: @trekonomics Families, man. The Book of Genesis tried to warn us, but did we listen?

item.description: @MisfitTorah @nechamaaaa RHS inaugurating a kollel by feting an arms dealer with a shiur on tumat met as applied to kohanim flying over cemeteries played a large role in my post-YU radicalization.
item.source:markdown: @MisfitTorah @nechamaaaa RHS inaugurating a kollel by feting an arms dealer with a shiur on tumat met as applied to kohanim flying over cemeteries played a large role in my post-YU radicalization.
